author: julianfoad
msg: In run_tests.py, display "XPASS" before "FAIL" in the summaries because "FAIL"
is the more interesting and we want to display the results in order from least
interesting to most interesting. Also make cosmetic changes in that code.
(run): Move "XPASS" before "FAIL" in the summaries. Unconditionally print the
summaries header line because we never expect all the summaries (including
the number of tests that passed) to be empty. Tidy the code. Expand the doc

author: rhuijben
msg: As part of the ongoing work of finalizing the dirent/uri/relpath api for
1.7, commit a few of the changes still waiting in my working copy for
(header): Add some documentation on the different path formats.
(svn_cl__info): Urls don't have a local format.

author: hwright
msg: (apr-pools): Re-add the concept of destroying iterpools. (Followup to r40048.)

author: hwright
msg: (crop_children): Fix typo which resulted in a compilation error.
(apr-pools): Add some guidance about pool usage.

msg: Following up on r40043, document svn_depth_immediates as a valid
